attributes.action: Stop police brutality. Justice for Terrell Decosta Jones-Burton.
attributes.background: The Uk police beat this boy because they thought he stole a mobile phone. Absolutely terrible, there was no need for violence.

rejection.details:
This incident is already being investigated by the Independent Police Complaints Commission. You can find out more here:

https://www.ipcc.gov.uk/news/update-investigation-metropolitan-police-officer%E2%80%99s-contact-15-year-old-cyclist
